title: Roasted Carrot Chews Recipe for Kids and Toddlers
content:
This is my latest addiction, I made this for baby and they loved it to the core. More than them I loved it so much. It is sweet and well browned and so good. Great for little ones. Instead of boiled carrots, give them this. It is tasty and nutritious and really yummy.

 

Preparation Time: 5 mins

Baking Time: 25 to 30 mins

Serves: 2

 

Ingredients:

 

Carrots – 3 to 4 large

Salt to taste

Olive Oil or any Cooking Oil – 1 tsp

 

Method:

 

Preheat oven to 200 degrees C.

Peel and wash carrots, slice it into long strips. 

Take it in a bowl, season with salt and oil and toss well.

Spoon this into baking pan and bake for 25 to 30 mins till the carrots are cooked and roasted to your liking. 

Remove it and cool it well. 

Serve to your kids or enjoy yourselves.

recommendations.title: Pear ( Sauce ) Puree Recipe for Babies
recommendations.content: Pears make great baby food. I give apple puree one day, pear puree the next day and I mix them and make apple pear puree and feed her. recommendations.title: Babies Curd Rice Recipe - Yogurt Rice Recipe for Kids And Babies
recommendations.content:
The key to making a tasty and kids friendly curd rice or yogurt rice is to add less yogurt and more milk which makes it tastier.
So give this a try and let me know how it turns out for you.

Cooking Time: 20 to 30 mins

recommendations.title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
recommendations.content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.
